data.actual_result: Everything is broken about Nicknames. You cannot reset the nickname without adding a space in the empty field of "change Nickname". Also doing so, the app thinks that the changes were not saved, even if you pressed the save button
data.expected_result: You should be able to delete the nickname and then press the save button - You shouldn't have a message saying some changes were not saved - You shouldn't have a confirmation message saying the nick was changed to "." when it was reseted.
data.short_description: The nicknames changes are very buggy and also everything related to them. You cannot reset Nicknames properly in server settings
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you can change Nicknames and there's people that have some - Go to settings, then to members, select one with a nickname, and delete the nick. - Observe that after the field is empty the save button doesn't appear - (optional) add a space then observe that the save button appears - (optional) press the save button, and observe the wrong confirmation message saying the nick was changed to "." - (optional) press the "go back" arrow (try to exit from user settings - go to another user). Observe that a message appears saying the changes were not saved even if you pressed the save button before.
